name: WaveneyBinDay
0:
”Alexa open Waveney Bin Day”
”Alexa tell Waveney Bin Day to check check bin day”
”Alexa ask Waveney Bin Day when is bin day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: waveney bin day
des: The Waveney Bin Day Alexa Skill is for residents of the Waveney District (Suffolk, UK). We have collected and organised the bin data of all roads within the Waveney District (as of Oct 2018) and provided an easy and simple way to find out which bins are next and when! To use this skill simply, say "Alexa, open Waveney Bin Day" and tell it which road you live on, after this quick setup the skill will tell you when your next bin day is and which colour to put out!
